amendment.description: To provide for expansion of the Junior Reserve Officers' Training Corps program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4308 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4308 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Ensign. (consideration: CR S6117-6122; text: CR S6117-6118) To provide for expansion of the Junior Reserve Officers' Training Corps program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4308 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4308 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Ensign.
